gameDetails.name: Deal or No Deal: Electronic Game
gameDetails.description: Compete against the bank or up to three other players in a battle to win big in this electronic home version of the international hit television show.  The rules are simple.  Each player selects a briefcase.  As each round progresses, players may keep their original briefcase or make a “Deal” with the bank to accept a cash offer in exchange for whatever dollar amount is in their selected briefcase.  The rotating electronic gameboard keeps track of all players' choices and their subsequent “Deals”…or “No Deals,” which are kept secret until the end of the game.  For ages 8 and up.
